welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Bradford, where small-town charm meets big adventures! Get ready to immerse yourself in our quaint streets, rich history, and beautiful nature. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beloved city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The international terminal with customs and immigration facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta, Frontier, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Alaska, JetBlue, Spirit, and other airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport is a small and modern facility, offering a comfortable and convenient travel experience.

terminals.name: Hangar Terminal
terminals.description: The hangar terminal at Wings Field Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, providing exclusive services and amenities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and hangar terminal.
